QuestData.Title: Pinchwhistle Gearworks
QuestData.Description: Commander, a courier arrived this morning.$b$bHe said he's from a goblin settlement to the southeast called the Pinchwhistle Gearworks. They've asked for our assistance with some sort of ecological disaster.$b$bWe're spread thin but if we can earn their trust then we might be able to gain a valuable ally.$b$bHead down there and see what sort of assistance we can provide. I've already spoken to the flight master and he's set up a special flight to get you out there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Hutou Featherwind to secure a flight to the Pinchwhistle Gearworks.
